flags.name: --value
flags.validation: At least one of --value or --description is required. Example: false.

flags.name: --description
flags.validation: At least one of --value or --description is required. Example: Updated description.

permissions: User must be admin to update application settings.
side_effects: Updates the specified application setting fields.
validation_notes: Requires application setting ID argument. At least one of --value or --description is required. Key cannot be updated.
